price: Ti otrpi ono što oni govore i sjeti se roba Našeg, Davuda, čvrstog u vjeri, koji se uvijek Allahu obraćao.
arabic: ٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱذۡكُرۡ عَبۡدَنَا دَاوُۥدَ ذَا ٱلۡأَيۡدِۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: iṣ'bir ʿalā mā yaqūlūna wa-udh'kur ʿabdanā dāwūda dhā al-aydi innahu awwābun
